LGTM

On Mon, Feb 20, 2012 at 12:13 AM, <dvyukov@google.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>

>
>
> Description:
> cmd/6c: add line feed after an error message
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5685051/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5685051/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/cmd/cc/lex.c
>
>
> Index: src/cmd/cc/lex.c
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/cmd/cc/lex.c
> +++ b/src/cmd/cc/lex.c
> @@ -112,7 +112,7 @@
>
>        case 'l':                       /* for little-endian mips */
>                if(thechar != 'v'){
> -                       print("can only use -l with vc");
> +                       print("can only use -l with vc\n");
>                        errorexit();
>                }
>                thechar = '0';
>
>
